meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix, Counter
meanings.meaning: 1. serving (of food); helping
2. chilled soba served on a dish (often on a wicker basket or in a shallow steaming basket) with dipping sauce Abbreviation, See also 盛り蕎麦
盛 【もり】

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 1. height (e.g. of summer); peak (e.g. of cherry blossom season); (in) season; full bloom; full swing (of a party, etc.) ざかり when used as a suffix桜の花は４月が盛りだ。The cherry blossoms are at their best in April.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 2. prime (of one's life); (one's) best days; bloom 彼は今男盛りだ。He is now in the prime of manhood.
3. (being in) heat; rut

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 1. height (e.g. of summer); peak (e.g. of cherry blossom season); (in) season; full bloom; full swing (of a party, etc.) ざかり when used as a suffix桜の花は４月が盛りだ。The cherry blossoms are at their best in April.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 2. prime (of one's life); (one's) best days; bloom 彼は今男盛りだ。He is now in the prime of manhood.
3. (being in) heat; rut
1. prosperous; flourishing; thriving; successful 日本では英語教育が盛んである。English education flourishes in Japan.
2. popular; widespread 我々の国ではウインタースポーツが盛んだ。Winter sports are very popular in our country.
3. active; lively; energetic; vigorous; brisk; strong 彼はまだ元気盛んだ。He is still full of energy.
4. enthusiastic; eager; hearty; frequent; repeated 医師は喫煙に関する警告を盛んに出し続けている。The medical profession keeps handing out warnings about smoking.
旺ん 【さかん】、壮ん 【さかん】
旺ん: Rarely-used kanji form. 壮ん: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. prosperous; flourishing; thriving; successful 日本では英語教育が盛んである。English education flourishes in Japan.
2. popular; widespread 我々の国ではウインタースポーツが盛んだ。Winter sports are very popular in our country.
3. active; lively; energetic; vigorous; brisk; strong 彼はまだ元気盛んだ。He is still full of energy.
4. enthusiastic; eager; hearty; frequent; repeated 医師は喫煙に関する警告を盛んに出し続けている。The medical profession keeps handing out warnings about smoking.
旺ん 【さかん】、壮ん 【さかん】
旺ん: Rarely-used kanji form. 壮ん: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: Winter sports are very popular in our country.
He is still full of energy.
The medical profession keeps handing out warnings about smoking.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to swell; to rise; to bulge; to be piled up 火山活動で地面が盛り上がった。The surface of the earth rose due to the volcanic activity.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to rouse; to get excited 観客は盛り上がっているよ。The audience is really charged up.
盛りあがる 【もりあがる】、盛り上る 【もりあがる】、盛上がる 【もりあがる】、盛上る 【もりあがる】

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 1. flowers in full bloom; time of year in which flowers are in full bloom 庭のバラは今花盛りです。The roses in the garden are in full bloom.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 2. the age at which someone (esp. a woman) is at the peak of their beauty

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

花ざかり 【はなざかり】

sentences.translation: The roses in the garden are in full bloom.
As a poet, he flowered in his twenties.
